teal.physics.em

Class PointChargeConductingSphere

  • java.lang.Object
    • teal.core.AbstractElement
      • teal.render.Rendered
        • teal.sim.SimRendered
          • teal.sim.engine.EngineRendered

              • teal.physics.em.EMObject
                • teal.physics.em.PointChargeConductingSphere
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, HasID, Referenced, TElement, THasPropertyChange, TUpdatable, Integratable, GeneratesE, GeneratesP, HasCharge, HasBoundingArea, HasColor, HasDirection, HasFog, HasNode3D, HasPosition, HasRotation, IsMoveable, IsPickable, TAbstractRendered, TDrawable, TRendered, HasCollisionController, Constrainable, HasSimEngine, HasMass, HasMomentOfInertia, HasVelocity, PhysicalElement, TSimElement

    public class PointChargeConductingSphere
extends EMObject
implements HasCharge, GeneratesE, GeneratesP
    Represents the most basic EM object, a point charge.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void update()
        Description copied from interface: TUpdatable
        Insures that any working values are syncrhronized with the 'published' values, and that PropertyChange and visual changes are propagated. This should not be called in highly compute intensive sections of code, but only at the end of the scene integration.
